channel.title: Rep-- abuse
channel.description:
Alright, I go in any thread, and see the people i recognize/associate with (around) 200 rep, but now at 190ish, what I think is people are just going around into threads and just rep-- everyone..
Rep-- me if you want, I don't give a shit.
Discuss/Rant?
EDIT: I didn't know using the rep-- feature on some kid that spammed would get me rep reset lulz.

item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Alright, that’s about it for this topic. If the topic owner sees a reason for this to remain open, send me a PM.

When a post is bad, think of it as a type of vote on a post’s character.
[/quote]

Kind of like the thumbs up or thumbs down buttons on the Youtube comments.[/quote]

Okay.

item.title: Rep-- abuse
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:97, topic:325777”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=422187.msg3099718#msg3099718 date=1263621215]

Nice to see that so many of you are already misusing the system.
The whole idea behind reputation is that you as the community can make or break people when they do something that’s good or bad. Of course, due to the amount of reputation that has been circulated it isn’t worth shit anymore. But it could have been a tentative measure of character if that wasn’t the case.

Anyway, I’ve joined the fun and had a little myself. Amerika has lost his, as has the IceTicker guy. And if anyone gives them more to replenish it, I’ll simply send them straight back down to zero, again and again.
Don’t like that? Tough shit, you shouldn’t be abusing what is effectively voting power (repping someone is like giving them a vote of confidence).

Lothy, you sir are a pimp.

I think there should be a reset on everyones rep. You know start fresh like the new upgrate to 2.0?
[/quote]

Dumbfuck, if we all start at 0 then how will anyone rep?[/quote]
mawds?

Read full topic

item.title: Rep-- abuse
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Please remember kids, abusing rep does not work in the long run.

Read full topic
